CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Market relative to Echo Trade?
SRP.A: Ironwood Market is {below} Echo Trade in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverleaf Emporium relative to Starfall Mart?
SRP.A: Silverleaf Emporium is {above} Starfall Mart in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starfall Mart relative to Nova Exchange?
SRP.A: Starfall Mart is {below} Nova Exchange in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total price index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Silverleaf Emporium}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total price index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Nova Exchange}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Ironwood Market's maximum Price Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Ironwood Market's maximum Price Index is in {1964}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Crimson Bazaar's minimum Price Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Crimson Bazaar's minimum Price Index is in {1965}.

NC.Q: Between 1979 and 1983, was the average total Price Index higher or lower than between 1966 and 1972?
NC.A: The average total price index between 1979 and 1983 was {higher} than between 1966 and 1972.

NC.Q: Was the total Price Index in 1981 higher or lower than in 1987?
NC.A: The total price index in 1981 was {lower} than in 1987.

NC.Q: Between 1968 and 1991, was the average total Price Index higher or lower than between 1986 and 1992?
NC.A: The average total price index between 1968 and 1991 was {lower} than between 1986 and 1992.

NC.Q: Was the total Price Index in 1970 higher or lower than in 1977?
NC.A: The total price index in 1970 was {lower} than in 1977.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Silverleaf Emporium} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Crimson Bazaar and Silverleaf Emporium first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Crimson Bazaar and Silverleaf Emporium did not exchange leading positions.
